markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Twining Staff](/Equipment.aspx?ID=396)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 602 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 250 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 or 2 hands

**Bulk**  to 2
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=12), [Bo Staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=17)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Appearing to be just a small, flat disc made of twigs, this item can grow and shrink.

<document level="2" id="action-222" />

When you expand the item, you can use the force of the expansion to [High Jump](/Actions.aspx?ID=36) or to try to [Force Open](/Actions.aspx?ID=34) a door or the like by wedging the disc into a gap before activation. The staff makes the [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) check with a +15 modifier.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Twining Staff

When you expand the item, you can use the force of the expansion to High Jump or to try to Force Open a door or the like by wedging the disc into a gap before activation. The staff makes the Athletics check with a +15 modifier.
